item.title: Dogs
item.description: This is the best dog, Ellie: Right now, she is my only pup. Maybe when she gets less crazy I can get another one.

item.title: Overview
item.description: These docs summarize some technologies and respective commands related to Backend and Platform Engineering. Feel free to post a PR to update typos or new interesting commands, or put in an issue if you wish to see a whole new module.

item.title: Basic Commands
item.description: docker --version: Displays the installed version of Docker. docker pull <image>: Downloads a Docker image from a registry. docker images: Lists all the Docker images on the local system.

item.title: Basic Commands
item.description: Baseline commands kubectl get pods - check if the pods are starting correctly. You can add | grep -c <deployment-name> to count how many pods you have at a current time.

item.title: Public Speaking Events
item.description: Diversity and Inclusion in the tech world 27/06/2024 I was a guest in an event for Career Management in Tech where I spoke about the importance of diversity and inclusion in the workplace, as a representative of As Raparigas do CÃ³digo.
